name: Inkognito's Phantom of Prophecy
description:
THIS IS A COMPANION APP, TO BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE INKOGNITO BOARDGAME.

Inkognito is a spy game for 3 to 5 players, for 10 years old and up. A game lasts 90 minutes. A game by Leo Colovini and Alex Randolph.

The goal of each agent in Inkognito is to complete a mission, together with his partner. At the beginning of the game, however, players don't know which mission they must fulfill!

The Phantom of Prophecy app serves as a digital replacement for the Phantom of Prophecy used in the boardgame as a randomizer to determine his three available actions, offering players some cool extra, like deciding if you want to play classic 1988 rules or Ares Games revised rules.
